Title: Secrets and Lies
Plot: Dawson is torn about telling Jen the scandalous secret he has about Eve and even more distressed when his mom unexpectedly returns from Philadelphia. Meanwhile, Andie accuses Joey of sabotaging her chance to reunite with Pacey; and Jen shocks the entire town with the entertainment she has hired for the Annual Homecoming Queen Gala and shocks the very shy Henry even more when she asks him to be her escort.
GuestStars: K Callan, Niklaus Lange, Pat Gleason, Barbara Weetman, Thomas Joseph Martovitz Jr., Shane German, Acie Hendricks, Dan Martin
